author: gweigod_
content:
hey all, looking to run a checkpoint sync consensus client (as the provider) - please let me know if this repo is the most recent/easiest way to setup one: https://github.com/ethpandaops/checkpointz 

I don't need any fancy bells and whistles, thanks!

author: gweigod_
content: also to confirm, there's no ability (or reason) to run a checkpoint sync EL, it all depends on the CL?

author: pietjepuk
content: Checkpointz is not a consensus client, you need to run a CL+EL client pair to point Checkpointz at.

author: pietjepuk
content: Correct, it's just about telling a CL client "this is the head of the chain". Then CL and EL clients take the syncing from there, downloading state and backfilling blocks.
